Musician

Are you still a musician if you don’t make any music?

Since I first picked up a guitar at the age of fifteen or thereabouts, I’ve been in love with music. I listen to everything from thrash metal to classical to dubstep — my Last.fm charts are pretty diverse, although the rock and indie does tend to float to the top.

Like a lot of web folks, I was in a band for a while. We never got anywhere, but I still have some old recordings hidden in the depths of iTunes; here are a couple of the better ones:

music goes here

There’s a longer rumination on my musical career in a 2006 post on my blog: My slightly embarrassing musical past. (Whatever happened to Odeo anyway?)
